snippet: After Kemba Walker's potentially tying 3-point try went around the rim and out at the buzzer of the Charlotte Hornets' third consecutive loss, the star guard and coach Steve Clifford agreed on this: The team needs to be more physical....
lead_paragraph: After Kemba Walker's potentially tying 3-point try went around the rim and out at the buzzer of the Charlotte Hornets' third consecutive loss, the star guard and coach Steve Clifford agreed on this: The team needs to be more physical.

headline.main: Walker, Hornets Lose 3rd Straight Game, 109-106 at Wizards
headline.print_headline: Walker, Hornets Lose 3rd Straight Game, 109-106 at Wizards
